Token.Abstract: A message listener receives updates concerning {@link ILPMessage messages}.
Informs this listener that a new {@link ILPMessage message} has been added to the {@link ILPMessageProvider message provider} associated with the application.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message that was added to the message provider (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that a {@link ILPMessage message} previously known to the {@link ILPMessageProvider message provider} associated with the application was deleted from the provider.

Parameter.Name: id_
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier of the message that was deleted (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that a {@link ILPMessage message} already known to the {@link ILPMessageProvider message provider} associated with the application was modified in some way.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message that was modified (should never be nil)
